mentions.speaker: contact
mentions.quote: I got a letter saying there's a lawsuit on my Capital One account.
mentions.context: Client brings up legal action during credit review.

agent_response_quote: Because that account has a lawsuit filed against it, we won't be able to include it in the program. We'll need to remove that one from enrollment.
violation_reason: Litigation was discussed and the agent clearly communicated that the account with the lawsuit cannot be enrolled in the program.
key_evidence_quote: Because that account has a lawsuit filed against it, we won't be able to include it in the program.
